imdb.title: Brave 10
imdb.plot: A girl being pursued by assassins runs into a ronin samurai. He saves her and subsequently can't get rid of her, as she begs for him to escort her to a nearby castle. Once there the lord is initially reluctant to help her but turn...

episodes.title: The Fateful Two
episodes.plot: Saizo, the wondering Samurai, saved the life of Isanami, the priestess of Izumo. After escorting her to Ueda Castle and witnessing her power, he won't be able to leave her side again.

episodes.title: Dark and Light
episodes.plot: A rumor of an uwabami has been circling around the land, while the people prepare for the harvest festival. Saizo decides to kill the beast, but what he discovers is the kingdom is in far more danger...

episodes.title: Valley of Whirlwinds
episodes.plot: Saizo, Isanami, and Kakei are ambushed by the thief, Kamanosuke. Enjoying the battle, Kamanosuke kidnaps and tortures Isanami, to draw out the cold killer within Saizo.

episodes.title: The Souls of the Gods
episodes.plot: With Isanami help, they discover a staircase to an underground cavern. Once there they are ambushed by Hanzo and Okatsu looking for the Kushimi Jewel. With Saizo injured and Kakei under Okatsu spell, an unexpected wind comes to help.

episodes.title: The Heart of the Dragon
episodes.plot: Saizo has lost his will to battle after Isanami's kidnapping, Yukimura sends Sasuke and Anastasia to assist in the rescue. Isanami herself, has lost her resolve, she fears that everybody around her will be hurt. Can they overcome their insecurities or is their time over?

episodes.title: Taizen Meido
episodes.plot: Yukimura has invited his warriors to his private hot spring. While there Saizo, Kakei, Kamanosuke, and Sasuke get into a fight with the monk Seikai. The warriors are losing to this powerful monk and are currently unable to do anything, until an unlikely ally stops the battle.

episodes.title: Sword and Fan
episodes.plot: A tea ceremony is being held at the palace and all lords are expected to show. Yukimura chooses to travel with Saizo, Isanami, and Rokuro. But an onslaught of traps on the mountain road might leave Yukimura wishing he brought more warriors.

episodes.title: The Birth of a Warrior
episodes.plot: Ieyasu has announced that Yukimura is to be executed on the spot if he does not surrender. Blocked by the sea and an army chasing him, help will come from a new warrior; One powerful enough to stop Seikai's blows with one hand.

episodes.title: The True Face of Ice
episodes.plot: After the long trip home, Saizo demands that Yukimura explain what his end game is. While Yukimura explains each warrior's role, the story takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: The Start of Tragedy
episodes.plot: Hanzo is alive and he has gathered the Five Iga Ninjas, a group trained to kill other ninjas. Can Yukimara's Brave warriors fight off these highly skilled killers or will Izanami-no-Mikoto finally be resurrected?

episodes.title: The Wail of Darkness
episodes.plot: The Braves continue to be hunted down and Kamanosuke is trapped by Raizu. Anastasia forces Jinpachi hand in a battle on water. And Isanami wants power.

episodes.title: The Warrior of Light
episodes.plot: The prophecy of Izumo has come true and only the power of braves can stop it. Can Saizo bring himself to strike down Isanami to save the world?
